title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 454.8 - Waivers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 454.8 - Waivers

State Regulations

Any waiver at any time by either customer or authority of its
rights with respect to a default or any other matter arising in connection with
service to customer shall not be deemed to be a waiver with respect to any
subsequent default or matter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
454.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
